recommendations.justification: O1 is a better fit as it involves explaining how microorganisms cause infections, which can include asymptomatic presentations.
recommendations.question_text: Neonates with Congenital syphilis may be asymptomatic at birth. Give reason.

recommendations.justification: O3 is still the best fit as it explicitly involves morphology, which includes diagrams of structures like the Hydatid cyst.
recommendations.question_text: Draw a neatly labelled diagram of the Hydatid cyst

recommendations.justification: None of the listed objectives (O1-O6) cover informed consent. This question may need to be mapped to a different domain or set of objectives.
